casebody.data:
2002-1912 (La. 10/25/02)

Joseph GREFER, et al. v. ALPHA TECHNICAL, et al. No. 2002-CC-1912. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Exxon Mobil Corp.;—Defendant; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. A, Nos. 97-15004, 2000-4685; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No(s). 2002-CM-0365, 2002-C-0876.

Denied.
